name: Onward Space Journey
description:
Start your journey through space and hop from one planet to the next to discover many new worlds! Travel the infinity of space and perfect your navigational skill in order to lose as few ships as possible. But be careful, there are opposing gravitational forces trying to pull you away from course. You need to adjust launch-degree and -force of your rocket to navigate these black and white zones.

How many planets will you discover? There is only one direction to find out – ONWARD!
publishers: We Think Things Play Monaco & Meyer GbR.
